sentences.sContent: I expected her to be taller than me, not shorter.
sentences.sCn: 我曾以为她个子比我高，不会比我矮。

sentences.sContent: ...Higher-income children are more likely to declare boredom and expect their parents to solve their problems...
...you would expect to find a technological specification like this on your tandard laptop in an office anywhere in the world...
...you would expect to find a technological specification like this on your standard laptop in an office anywhere in the world...
...what can we expect to see by the year 2020...
...We can expect that the ever-growing list of devices...
...So we expect that the second part of the year would not be very good in terms of wage growth...
...they expect to earn that money back over the planned life of the plant...
...we would expect to see a negative relationship between the commitment to athletics and academic achievement...
...I believe that changing the rules of capitalism will require a change in what citizens expect and ask of politics...
...businesses do not expect customers to suddenly charge up a storm...

words.tran: 期待的；怀孕的；预期中的

trans.tranOther: to think that you will find that someone or something has a particular quality or does a particular thing
